Nitobi.RefreshButtonItem

Nitobi.RefreshButtonItem Class Reference

A grid toolbar item that will put the Grid's standard refresh button in the grid toolbar. More...

Inheritance diagram for Nitobi.RefreshButtonItem:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

A grid toolbar item that will put the Grid's standard refresh button in the grid toolbar.

If no attributes are set for the various properties of this toolbar button, the standard Grid's button values will be used. However, you can override the image used by the button or the tooltip display by simply setting this item's properties to the values desired.
